author: ipvalverde
body:
The 3rd code example of Receive-Job's cmdlet (_Example 3: Get results of several background jobs_) has a typo on one of its comments, the word "just" has a missing "j", so it is as "ust"

This is the part with the wrong text:
```powershell
# Use the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the results of ust the Job3 child job that ran on the Server02 computer.
```

comments.author: ipvalverde
comments.body: Oops, looks like this should be in the powershell-docs repo. I'll post it there.

title: Typo on Receive-Job's 3rd example
